backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor implementing ward-based waterborne disease risk prediction with environmental data tracking (rainfall, humidity, turbidity, bacteria), moving averages, risk calculation logic, and ward data storage using a Map.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the reversion from Version 18/19 to Version 17, removing multi-class disease classification features and restoring original component states with 15 input fields in GovernmentDataPanel and 8 fields in RiskPredictionPanel.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of frontend components describing Version 17 state with clean white medical analytics theme, role-based routing, 8-field risk prediction form, ward heatmap with localStorage integration, and professional blue/yellow/red color palette.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark mode CSS variables for medical analytics theme including background, foreground, primary, secondary, destructive, border, and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for Community Health Sentinel app with EmailJS SDK integration (public key KHu3JNagtUgZCsDcG) and root div for React mounting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app with TanStack Router configuration, role-based routing (citizen/healthcare/government), RoleSelector integration, logout handler, and Toaster for notifications.
frontend/src/components/AlertEngine.tsx: Alert engine component displaying color-coded risk alerts (green <30%, yellow 30-70%, red >70%) with recommended actions for low, moderate, and high outbreak risk levels using medical-themed styling.
frontend/src/components/AlertHistory.tsx: Displays a filterable table of historical cholera alerts with 13 columns including timestamp, ward, environmental metrics (rainfall, humidity, turbidity, bacteria), infrastructure coverage, risk levels, and recommended actions. Loads and refreshes data from localStorage every 5 seconds.
frontend/src/components/CaseVolumeProjec: Shows a 7-day projection table of expected cholera case volumes based on risk category (low/moderate/high), generating simulated estimates with upward trends and variance.
frontend/src/components/DataFreshnessFoo: Renders a footer displaying the current date, time, and data source information for the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/DiagnosticReason: Empty component file with no content.
frontend/src/components/DiseaseClassific: Displays disease risk distribution for four waterborne diseases (Cholera, Typhoid, Dysentery, Hepatitis A) using bar and pie charts, updating via custom events with probability data.
frontend/src/components/DistrictRiskOver: Shows four key metrics cards: District Risk Index, High-Risk Wards count, Monsoon Impact level, and System Status, with values derived from the current risk percentage.
frontend/src/components/EmergencyAlertDi: Empty component file with no content.
frontend/src/components/ExplainableAI.ts: Visualizes the contribution of four environmental factors (rainfall, humidity, turbidity, bacteria) to the overall risk percentage using horizontal bar charts with normalized impact values.
frontend/src/components/ExportButton.tsx: Generates and downloads a CSV file containing ward-level risk analysis data including outbreak probability, risk level, vulnerability metrics, and infrastructure coverage for all 9 wards.
frontend/src/components/FeatureImportanc: Empty component file with no content.
frontend/src/components/ForecastChart.ts: Displays a 14-day predictive risk forecast line chart with generated data showing realistic variance and upward trend, including confidence score (87%) and model AUC (0.91) metrics.
frontend/src/components/GovernmentDataPa: Government data input panel with 15+ fields (ward, rainfall, humidity, turbidity, bacteria, sanitation, etc.) that calculates 7-day averages, updates risk via backend actor, stores environmental history in localStorage, and sends email alerts.
frontend/src/components/InterventionPrio: Displays ward-level intervention priorities by calculating priority scores based on outbreak probability, vulnerability weights (sanitation, water treatment, population density), and overall risk; shows sortable table and bar chart of all wards.
frontend/src/components/LastGovernmentRe: Displays the most recent government inspection report from localStorage, showing timestamp, ward, water quality metrics, bacteria levels, environmental data, and risk level in a formatted card layout.
frontend/src/components/NearestSupportCe: Static card component displaying contact information for the nearest health support center including name, address, phone number, and operating hours.
frontend/src/components/PatientCaseTrend: Renders a 30-day line chart of patient case trends with generated realistic data including variance and occasional spikes using Recharts.
frontend/src/components/PreventiveRecomm: Displays a static list of four preventive health recommendations (boil water, wash hands, avoid street food, seek medical attention) with icons in a card layout.
frontend/src/components/ResourceEstimati: Calculates and visualizes required resources (medical staff, hospital beds, water purification units, chlorination teams) based on risk level and percentage using a bar chart and detailed list.
frontend/src/components/ResourcePlanning: Provides resource planning recommendations for staff allocation, supply management, and bed capacity based on risk category (low/moderate/high) with icon-labeled sections.
frontend/src/components/RiskComponentBre: Displays a bar chart showing the weighted contribution of four risk factors (rainfall, humidity, turbidity, bacteria) to overall cholera outbreak risk using Recharts.
frontend/src/components/RiskGauge.tsx: Shows the current risk level as a percentage with color-coded display (green/yellow/red) and progress bar, listening for 'risk-data-updated' custom events to update dynamically.
frontend/src/components/RiskPredictionPa: Input form for environmental and health parameters (8 fields including rainfall, humidity, turbidity, bacteria index, etc.) with validation, role-based field visibility, and backend actor integration for risk prediction.
frontend/src/components/RoleSelector.tsx: Landing page component that displays three user role cards (Common Citizen, Hospital/PHC, Government Health Authority) for role selection with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/SafetyAdvisory.t: Displays context-appropriate safety recommendations based on risk category (low/moderate/high) with color-coded alerts and actionable health guidance.
frontend/src/components/SystemArchitectu: Collapsible card showing a vertical flow diagram of the system's four-layer architecture from user dashboard to cloud infrastructure with deployment notes.
frontend/src/components/WardComparison.t: Bar chart comparing outbreak probability across 9 wards using adjustment factors applied to overall risk, with color-coded bars based on risk thresholds.
frontend/src/components/WardHeatmap.tsx: Grid-based heatmap visualization of 9 wards with color-coded risk levels, loading ward-specific data from localStorage or fallback generator and calculating per-ward risks using sanitation, water treatment, and population density factors.
frontend/src/components/WardSelector.tsx: A React component that renders a dropdown selector for choosing one of nine wards, with a required field indicator and medical-themed styling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that creates and manages an ICP backend actor based on Internet Identity authentication state, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flows, identity persistence, and authentication status with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining a clean white medical analytics theme with professional blue primary colors, chart colors, and custom medical-themed utility classes for shadows and alert backgrounds.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main dashboard page component that renders different views (citizen, health worker, admin) with tabs for risk monitoring, predictions, alerts, and various health analytics panels based on user role.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page component showcasing the AI-powered disease early warning system with hero section, feature grid highlighting real-time monitoring, water quality tracking, automated alerts, and trend analysis.
Service for sending email alerts via EmailJS with risk assessment data, including parameter validation, formatted template parameters, and detailed console logging for debugging.
frontend/src/utils/diseaseClassifier.ts: Utility file for disease classification logic (content truncated/empty in provided snippet).
frontend/src/utils/wardDataGenerator.ts: Generates deterministic ward data (sanitation coverage, water treatment coverage, population density) for 9 wards using seeded pseudo-random functions based on ward IDs.
frontend/src/utils/wardRiskCalculator.ts: Calculates ward-specific disease risk by applying vulnerability multipliers based on sanitation, water treatment, population density, and environmental factors to a base risk value.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining design system with OKLCH color tokens, medical/government theme colors, custom spacing, and plugin integrations for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata documenting the Community Health Sentinel system architecture, role-based access control (Citizen/Hospital/Government), known issues with ward heatmap persistence, and existing features for the water-borne disease early warning system.
